properties.description: Open House is open every weekday, 2-4, offering community and food. Open Table, on Sundays 1-2pm offers a free, three-course meal for up to 30 people.
properties.title: Aberdeen Methodist Church

properties.address: Aberdeen Football Club Ltd, Aberdeen, Aberdeenshire AB24 5QH
properties.description: Aberdeen FC Community Trust hosts a Wellbeing Hub, Every Thursday between 1pm-4pm guests will be welcomed into the Pittodrie to enjoy free hot food, tea & coffee as well as a range of weekly activities, all within a family friendly, relaxed and cosy space. Board games, newspapers, TV and free Wi-Fi will also be available. *If attending please enter through the RDS reception (located by the Sir Alex Ferguson statue)* Advice and guidance will also be provided by local organisations to assist with any support which you may require including, energy bills, housing, cost of living or your health and wellbeing. Food Packs and Sanitary Products are also available free of charge. Facilities include free car parking, baby changing and accessible toilets.
properties.title: Pittodrie Community Hub

properties.description: A warm welcoming space. Meet new people, play board games and jigsaws, book swap, bring your own craft and knitting, chat or just relax with a hot drink. Food and refreshments are provided. Monday 10am-1pm
